attributes.additional_details:
Since its inception, the program has benefitted thousands of teenagers by providing them with opportunities to work on meaningful projects that improve local communities; build essential life skills such as leadership, teamwork, and resilience.  

NCS also played a vital role in bridging social divides, bringing together young people from different backgrounds to collaborate and grow. It was a key investment in the future of our youth and the strength of our communities.
attributes.background: To reinstate funding and resources for the National Citizen Service (NCS) program, ensuring it can operate nationwide and continue to provide young people with transformative experiences.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Save the National Citizens Service: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701592
